channel.title: MYB

item.title: How A Tiny Polish Startup Became The Multi-Billion-Dollar Voice Of AI
item.description: ElevenLabs’ computer voices are so convincing they could fool your mother. That’s both a blessing and a curse for the four-year-old company.
